titles.title: Recognizing the week beginning March 21, 2011, as "National Safe Place Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 3/8/2011--Introduced. Recognizes National Safe Place Week and calls upon the people of the United States and interested groups to promote awareness of, and volunteer involvement in, the Safe Place program.
